import React from 'react' import {Helmet} from "react-helmet"; import emailjs from 'emailjs-com' import Footer from "../Components/Footer"; const ContactPage = _ => { //TODO Message send const send = (e) => { e.preventDefault() emailjs.sendForm('service_t93tkgd' , 'template_x2gd85j', e.target,'user_kKIfPmIWmVdjBpwuBJCWq') .then(result => console.log(result)) e.target.reset() } return ( <> Contact Me
